memberdef.name: check
check_string
require
require_string
require_noerr
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int localErr; \ \ localErr = (int)(ERR); \ if (unlikely(localErr != 0)) { \ debug_print_assert(localErr, NULL, NULL, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ goto LABEL; \ } \ \ } while(1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_noerr_string
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int localErr; \ \ localErr = (int)(ERR); \ if (unlikely(localErr != 0)) { \ debug_print_assert(localErr, NULL, STR, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ goto LABEL; \ } \ } while(1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_noerr_action_string
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int localErr; \ \ localErr = (int)(ERR); \ if (unlikely(localErr != 0)) { \ debug_print_assert(localErr, NULL, STR, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ { ACTION; } \ goto LABEL; \ } \ } while(1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_noerr_action
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int localErr; \ \ localErr = (int)(ERR); \ if (unlikely(localErr != 0)) { \ debug_print_assert(localErr, NULL, NULL, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ { ACTION; } \ goto LABEL; \ } \ } while(1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_noerr_action_quiet
require_action
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (unlikely(!(X))) { \ debug_print_assert(0, #X, NULL, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ { ACTION; } \ goto LABEL; \ } \ } while (1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_action_string
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (unlikely(!(X))) { \ debug_print_assert(0, #X, STR, SHORT_FILE, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \ { ACTION; } \ goto LABEL; \ } \ } while (1 == 0)

memberdef.name: require_action_quiet
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (unlikely(!(X))) { \ { ACTION; } \ goto LABEL; \ } \ \ } while(1 == 0)
